game.name: DaemonBride:ADDITIONAL GAIN
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In 2025, the popular arcade game "Demon Bride" is back on Steam! A fighting game depicting the battle between 17 angels and demons. Enjoy high-speed, deep battles with flashy bullets and powerful special moves. In addition, the rollback-compatible net code allows for smooth online battles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In 2025, the popular arcade game "Demon Bride" is back on Steam! A fighting game depicting the battle between 17 angels and demons. Enjoy high-speed, deep battles with flashy bullets and powerful special moves. In addition, the rollback-compatible net code allows for smooth online battles.
